title: So, is there anyway to refuse a gift?
body:
I am approaching the ownership of every single league champion. Except for {{champion:90}} who I hate, with a burning passion of 1000 raging suns. I once swore to punch Ezreal(the developer) just for making him if I ever had the fortunate misfortune of meeting him face-to-face...

My problem is that several of my friends have all promised to gift him, and all of his skins to me once I finally get the everyone else. Is there any way to prevent that? Or am I doomed to get the space-aids from all of my friends.{{item:3070}}
